title: It's interesting, but not quite my type of movie.
review: I personally liked seeing the characters push past their issues, but I would have enjoyed it more if I was more into sports.

title: Accurate to the book and even has a chilling conspiracy!
review: The previous movie deviated from the book in multiple places and in general I didn't really enjoy that, but I saw this and I noticed everything aligned well. Plus, I have a feeling that Willy Wonka planned every minute of his tour down to who would be eliminated and where! All in all it was pretty good.

title: At first confused, but I figured out the beauty of it looking back
review: Thing is I at first was continuously confused by this movie because I thought it was riddled with plotholes, but when I looked back and took into consideration that it may not all be real, I actually saw this as pretty good! Plus Joaquin Pheonix was so confident in his role!
